com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api

Class BaseCrawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api.BaseCrawler

  • public abstract class BaseCrawler
extends Object
    Provides a skeletal implementation of a crawler to minimize the effort for users to implement their own.
    Author:
    Peter Bencze

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected BaseCrawler(CrawlerConfiguration config)
      Base constructor which is used to configure the crawler.
      protected BaseCrawler(InputStream inStream)
      Base constructor which loads a previously saved state.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseCrawler

        protected BaseCrawler(CrawlerConfiguration config)
        Base constructor which is used to configure the crawler.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration of the crawler

      • BaseCrawler

        protected BaseCrawler(InputStream inStream)
        Base constructor which loads a previously saved state.
        Parameters:
        inStream - the input stream from which the state should be loaded

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public final void start()
        Starts the crawler using HtmlUnit headless browser. This method will block until the crawler finishes.

      • start

        public final void start(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver webDriver)
        Starts the crawler using the browser specified by the given WebDriver instance. This method will block until the crawler finishes.
        Parameters:
        webDriver - the WebDriver instance to control the browser

      • saveState

        public final void saveState(OutputStream outStream)
        Saves the current state of the crawler to the given output stream.
        Parameters:
        outStream - the output stream

      • resumeState

        public final void resumeState()
        Resumes the previously loaded state using HtmlUnit headless browser. This method will block until the crawler finishes.

      • resumeState

        public final void resumeState(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver webDriver)
        Resumes the previously loaded state using the browser specified by the given WebDriver instance. This method will block until the crawler finishes.
        Parameters:
        webDriver - the WebDriver instance to control the browser

      • registerCustomEventCallback

        protected final void registerCustomEventCallback(CrawlEvent event,
                                                 PatternMatchingCallback callback)
        Registers an operation which is invoked when the specific event occurs and the provided pattern matches the request URL.
        Parameters:
        event - the event for which the callback should be triggered
        callback - the pattern matching callback to invoke

      • stop

        protected final void stop()
        Gracefully stops the crawler.

      • crawl

        protected final void crawl(CrawlRequest request)
        Feeds a crawl request to the crawler. The crawler should be running, otherwise the request has to be added as a crawl seed instead.
        Parameters:
        request - the crawl request

      • crawl

        protected final void crawl(List<CrawlRequest> requests)
        Feeds multiple crawl requests to the crawler. The crawler should be running, otherwise the requests have to be added as crawl seeds instead.
        Parameters:
        requests - the list of crawl requests

      • downloadFile

        protected final void downloadFile(URI source,
                                  File destination)
                           throws IOException
        Downloads the file specified by the URL.
        Parameters:
        source - the source URL
        destination - the destination file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs while downloading the file

        Callback which gets called when the crawler is started.
